summary: This document appears to be a collection of garbled text fragments followed by a text message discussing a person named Glenn and property pressure in Nantucket, and concludes with a news article about the hiring of a general manager and executive chef at Westhaven Golf Club. The text message suggests potential conflict over property involving a person named Glenn.

persons.name: Scott Swerdlin
persons.context: Mentioned in a text message as having known a person named Glenn for 30 years, being close friends, and having done many deals together. He has spent time in Nantucket and knows the Matthews.

persons.name: Glenn
persons.role: Subject of discussion in text message
persons.context: Described as a close friend of Scott Swerdlin for 30 years. A neighbor named Vivian was reportedly afraid of him, and there were attempts to force her to sell her property to 'them' (presumably Glenn and associates).

persons.name: Vivian
persons.context: Described as a neighbor behind Palm House who was afraid of Glenn. The message indicates there were attempts to force her to sell her property.

persons.name: Perry Lancianese
persons.role: General Manager and Director of Golf Operations
persons.context: Hired as General Manager and Director of Golf Operations at Westhaven Golf Club, relocating from West Palm Beach, Florida. Has over 22 years of experience managing premium golf clubs and served as a golf consultant for Crystal Cruises.

persons.name: Bill Brown
persons.context: Hired as Executive Chef at Westhaven Golf Club. Previously served as Executive Chef at Palm Beach Polo Golf and Country Club in Wellington, Florida, with over 12 years of experience in private clubs.

connections.description: Described as close friends for 30 years who have done many deals together.
Vivian, a neighbor, was afraid of Glenn due to pressure to sell her property.
Both were hired to leadership positions (General Manager and Executive Chef) at Westhaven Golf Club around the same time in 2019.

events.title: Westhaven Golf Club Hires New Leadership
events.description: Westhaven Golf Club announces the hiring of Perry Lancianese as General Manager/Director of Golf Operations and Bill Brown as Executive Chef.

locations: South Hills Country Club, Covina, California
Birnamwood Golf Club, Santa Barbara, California
keyFacts: A text message discusses a person named Glenn, whom a neighbor named Vivian was afraid of, and alleges attempts to force her to sell her property.
Scott Swerdlin is mentioned as having a 30-year close friendship and business relationship with Glenn.
The document includes a news article from August 29, 2019, about personnel hires at Westhaven Golf Club in Franklin.
The initial pages of the document contain heavily garbled, likely corrupted or scanned text that is largely unreadable.
The connection between the text message content and the news article is not clear from the provided text.
